English: the six spirits that rule the vital organs (heart `心~[xin1], lungs `肺~[fei4], liver `肝~[gan1], kidneys `腎~|肾[shen4], spleen `脾~[pi2] and gall bladder `膽~|胆[dan3])
the six spirits that rule the vital organs (heart `心~[xin1], lungs `肺~[fei4], liver `肝~[gan1], kidneys `腎~|肾[shen4], spleen `脾~[pi2] and gall bladder `膽~|胆[dan3])
